text: Honor Blackman (22 August 1925 â€“ 5 April 2020) was an English actress. She was born in Plaistow, Essex. She is best known for her roles in the movie Goldfinger and on the television programmes, The Avengers and The Upper Hand (the British version of Who's the Boss). Blackman died at her home in Lewes on 5 April 2020.
